name: Waifu Space Conquest
description:
In Waifu Space Conquest you can play a nostalgic arcade game.

Conquer all the space to pass the level. Confine the aliens in your claimed space to kill them.
Think fast. Use all the power-ups available and be ready to keep going.
The enemies become stronger and more dangerous will you be able to claim their territory?

Enjoy the cyberpunk aesthetic. And unlock images as you go.


Features:
  • 50 Levels
  • Beautiful mix of pixel art and HD
  • Image gallery
  • 6 different power-ups
  • 6 types of enemies

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2314050/Waifu_Space_Conquest/
